sentences.sContent: Our friendship has steadily strengthened over the years.
Steve’s opposition only strengthened her resolve to go ahead.
sentences.sCn: 史蒂夫的反对反而坚定了她继续下去的决心。

sentences.sContent: The company plans to strengthen its hand (= make itself more powerful ) in Europe by opening an office in Spain.
sentences.sCn: 该公司计划在西班牙设立办事处，以此增强在欧洲的实力。

words.tran: 坚强的；强壮的；牢固的；擅长的
强有力地；坚强地；激烈地；气味浓地

remMethod.val: strength(力量)+en(使…)→(使)有力量→加强， 巩固

trans.tranOther: to become stronger or make something stronger
